lines: 1. Omotoria ntang'ane,Ase chinchera chionsi,Nde buya kond' as'ore,Mb' as' obwanchani bwao.
Ndae, ndae,Omotoria tinsira;Ndae amatuk' onsi,Ndae chinchera chionsi.
2. Naye obotamero,'Kero emechand' ere,Nde buya kore ang'e,Nsemeretie as'ore.
3. Ndae goik' omoerio,'Mechando yaerire,"Ngik' as' ense botaire,Marig'aratinyigwe.
